main_quests: Spend time with family and friends

nodes.name: Journal Daily
nodes.description: Daily reflection and self-assessment (VIA Character Strength: Zest).

nodes.name: Exercise Daily
nodes.description: Regular physical activity for improved health and fitness (ExerciseDB: VO2 Max).

nodes.name: Practice Vocal Skills Daily
nodes.description: Daily vocal exercises to improve articulation and projection (VIA Character Strength: Curiosity).

nodes.name: Dedicate Time to Volleyball
nodes.description: Participate in volleyball activities for improved coordination and teamwork (O*NET 2.B.1.b).

nodes.name: Dedicate Time to Coding
nodes.description: Engage in coding activities to develop programming skills (O*NET 2.B.1.b).

nodes.name: Spend Time with Family and Friends
nodes.description: Nurture relationships for social support and well-being (NVC Need: Belonging).

nodes.name: Code Daily
nodes.description: Daily coding practice to maintain and improve programming skills (O*NET 2.B.1.b).

nodes.name: Practice Warm-Up Routine
nodes.description: Perform a dynamic warm-up before physical activity (ExerciseDB: Joint Mobility).

nodes.name: Practice 'Wait 2 Seconds'
nodes.description: Practice active listening by waiting 2 seconds before responding (NVC Need: Understanding).

nodes.name: Clarity of Thought
nodes.description: The ability to think clearly and make sound judgments (CBT Distortion: All-or-Nothing Thinking).

nodes.name: Emotional Resilience
nodes.description: The ability to bounce back from adversity (VIA Character Strength: Perseverance).

nodes.name: Physical Strength
nodes.description: Muscular power and force (ExerciseDB: Posterior Chain Strength).

nodes.name: Physical Endurance
nodes.description: The ability to sustain physical effort over time (ExerciseDB: VO2 Max).

nodes.name: Physical Agility
nodes.description: Coordination and responsiveness (ExerciseDB: Balance).

nodes.name: Concentration
nodes.description: The ability to maintain attention on a task (CBT Distortion: Catastrophizing).

nodes.name: Logical Reasoning
nodes.description: The ability to think critically and solve problems (VIA Character Strength: Prudence).

nodes.name: Python Programming
nodes.description: Proficiency in the Python programming language (O*NET 2.A.3.1).

nodes.name: Social Empathy
nodes.description: The ability to understand and share the feelings of others (NVC Need: Connection).

nodes.name: Social Connection
nodes.description: The ability to form and maintain meaningful relationships (NVC Need: Belonging).

nodes.name: Leadership Skills
nodes.description: The ability to guide and motivate others (O*NET 3.1.1.1).
